name: Help Me, I'm Drowning
description:
A strange and goofy adventure set in a world where the water is orange and the dirt is pink. Our hero Leftie meets some new friends and has a great time.

Key features:

  • Less than an hour long
  • Robust and complex sandwich eating mechanics
  • Talk to trees, beds, and headstones
  • Get all the cards and win a prize

Contact me: @kittysaysmoo

More games by me: bretsepulveda.com/games.html
